Obito and Kakashi slash at their opponent, followed by Rin's back-flip kick. Rin cheers her teammates as they go forward. Emboldened by her support, Obito leapfrogs Kakashi, unleashing several [[Fire Release: Phoenix Sage Fire Technique|small fireballs]] at the opponent. Kakashi slashes through the flames and the opponent, and Rin finishes by jumping and stomping at the opponent, before cheering her teammates again.
